title.name: Title Slide
title.description: Hero opening slide with large bold title on the left and subtitle below. Clean, editorial feel with optional decorative element area on the right.

twoColumnSplit.name: Two Column Split
twoColumnSplit.description: Side-by-side sections with labeled headers. Each column has an uppercase label, descriptive content, key-value pairs, and a status line. Use for comparing two systems, domains, or perspectives.

timeline.name: Timeline / Evolution
timeline.description: Horizontal timeline showing progression across eras or phases. Each phase has a date label, icon area, title, and description. Use for showing technology evolution, roadmaps, or historical progression.

comparison.name: Old vs New Comparison
comparison.description: Two-column before/after comparison with contrasting headers. Left shows the old approach, right shows the new approach. Includes visual diagram areas and bullet points.

funnel.name: Funnel / Lifecycle
funnel.description: Vertical funnel or staged process showing transformation through numbered stages. Each stage has a title and description. Ends with a key takeaway callout.

centralHub.name: Central Hub Diagram
centralHub.description: Central element with radiating connected components. Center has a main label, with 3-4 surrounding satellite elements connected by lines. Use for architecture diagrams, system components, or relationship maps.

quadrant.name: Quadrant / Matrix Chart
quadrant.description: 2x2 quadrant chart with labeled axes. One quadrant is highlighted as the target zone. Includes a strategy panel on the right side.

horizontalProcess.name: Horizontal Process Flow
horizontalProcess.description: Left-to-right sequential process with labeled stages. Each stage has an icon area, title, and description. Includes a bottom callout bar for additional context.

problemSolution.name: Problem / Solution
problemSolution.description: Left panel shows the problem with description and visual area. Right panel shows the numbered solution steps. Includes a bottom value-delivered callout bar.

businessModel.name: Business Model Comparison
businessModel.description: Stacked cards showing old model vs new model with a strategic moat callout. Use for business model transitions, pricing changes, or strategy shifts.

supplyChain.name: Supply Chain / Pipeline
supplyChain.description: Chevron-style pipeline with 4-6 sequential stages. Each chevron has an icon area, title, and bullet points below.

threeColumn.name: Three Column Info
threeColumn.description: Three equal columns with icon area, title, and description in each. Clean layout for presenting three related concepts, options, or categories.

challengeTable.name: Challenge / Mitigation Table
challengeTable.description: Two-column table with icon rows. Left column shows challenges, right column shows mitigations. Each row has an icon area and text content.

closingSlide.name: Closing / Summary Slide
closingSlide.description: Bold central statement with supporting bullet points below. Use as a final takeaway or key message slide.

blueprintGrid.description: Subtle technical grid lines in background corners for depth
